messages.content: Who was the president of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints in the year 1900.

In 1900, the President of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints was Wilford Woodruff. He was the 4th President of the Church, and he served from 1889 to 1898. After his term as President, he continued to serve as the leader of the Church until his death in 1898.

Incorrect, Lorenzo Snow
Years as President: 1898â€“1901
Birth Date: 3 April 1814
Death Date: 10 October 1901

I apologize for the confusion. You are correct, Lorenzo Snow was the President of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints in 1901, not Wilford Woodruff. My previous answer was incorrect. Thank you for bringing this to my attention.
